title: Has anyone noticed how deathly quiet Riot has been since they announced Eternals?
body: Like not even any other acknowledgements or postings about it. They announce it, the community informs them of how much of a horrible product idea it is, and then it's been crickets. I want to know further developments on this. Did they decide to make them free? Did they decide to add new content to them to make them worth the RP? What's up with Eternals now that the community feedback has been resoundingly against the product pricing?
